content: Back in NYC, blending Japan's magic into my daily life. Excited for what's next, but missing the connections already.
raw_content: Back in NYC after an unforgettable journey in Japan. Excited for what's next, but also missing the connections I made. Time to blend those experiences into my life here!

related_goals.goal: Organize and participate in a local art or cultural event to expand social connections
Initiate a weekly gratitude journal to reflect on personal growth and relationships
